Entries.68260008/f Mike 3500/O Mike/w sunny: continue/-100 -100/farmer 18 13 3 Mike 8 8 0/skippable/viewport 11 10 true/move farmer -10 0 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move Mike 5 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/animate Mike false true 200 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31/move farmer 0 -5 1/pause 1000/stopAnimation Mike 0/faceDirection Mike 3/emote Mike 16/move Mike -3 0 3/pause 1000/speak Mike "@! 你看起来很困惑.$h#$b#我拍了一些老建筑的照片, 作为在我课堂上要使用的例子.#$b#这次的课题是在建筑中研究数学...#$b#哦, 抱歉. 说这些太无聊了.$h#$b#不过, 我基本上做完了. 你想和我一起去散步吗?$l"/move Mike -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 2/move Mike 0 10 2/move farmer 0 10 2/viewport 11 19 true/pause 3000/speak Mike "@, 我无法完全解释你对我有多重要.$l#$b#你每天都对我很好, 我知道没有你我撑不下去.$l#$b#所以, 我很感谢你."/pause 2000/speak Mike "对了, 让我给你拍张照片, 这样我工作时想你的时候就可以看看.$l"/pause 1000/move Mike 0 -3 3/move Mike -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/speak Mike "好的, 微笑!$h"/animate Mike false false 200 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31/pause 1000/speak Mike "你看上去好看极了, @!$h"/pause 2000/move Mike 0 2 2/move Mike -1 0 3/move Mike 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Mike 1/pause 2000/speak Mike "我爱你, @."/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 100/showFrame Mike 28/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote Mike 20/pause 3000/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
